plugin.name: miniwin_gq
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: put gquest targets in a minwin
plugin.description: Redirects the gq to the miniwindow.

muclient.script:
option_set_default('cmd', 'gq') option_set_default('plugin_colour', 'steelblue')
set_send_to_world(true)
cmd_update('help', 'send_to_world', true) add_cmd('check', {func=nofunc, help="", send_to_world=false})
window_set(gqwin)
init_plugin_vars() set_plugin_alias()
